changeSet.sql: CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW foosball.player_stats AS SELECT p.id, p.name, COUNT(DISTINCT g.id) as total_games, COUNT(CASE WHEN g.winner = 'WHITE' AND (g.white_team_player1_id = p.id OR g.white_team_player2_id = p.id) THEN 1 END) + COUNT(CASE WHEN g.winner = 'BLACK' AND (g.black_team_player1_id = p.id OR g.black_team_player2_id = p.id) THEN 1 END) as wins, COUNT(CASE WHEN g.winner = 'WHITE' AND (g.white_team_player1_id = p.id OR g.white_team_player2_id = p.id) THEN 1 END) + COUNT(CASE WHEN g.winner = 'BLACK' AND (g.black_team_player1_id = p.id OR g.black_team_player2_id = p.id) THEN 1 END) * 100.0 / NULLIF(COUNT(DISTINCT g.id), 0) as win_percentage FROM foosball.players p LEFT JOIN foosball.games g ON p.id IN (g.white_team_player1_id, g.white_team_player2_id, g.black_team_player1_id, g.black_team_player2_id) GROUP BY p.id, p.name;

CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW foosball.position_stats AS SELECT p.id, p.name, COUNT(DISTINCT g.id) as total_games, -- Goalie performance (assuming player1 is always goalie) SUM(CASE WHEN g.white_team_player1_id = p.id THEN COALESCE(g.white_team_goalie_score, 0) ELSE 0 END) + SUM(CASE WHEN g.black_team_player1_id = p.id THEN COALESCE(g.black_team_goalie_score, 0) ELSE 0 END) as total_goalie_goals, -- Forward performance (assuming player2 is always forward) SUM(CASE WHEN g.white_team_player2_id = p.id THEN COALESCE(g.white_team_forward_score, 0) ELSE 0 END) + SUM(CASE WHEN g.black_team_player2_id = p.id THEN COALESCE(g.black_team_forward_score, 0) ELSE 0 END) as total_forward_goals, -- Total goals SUM(CASE WHEN g.white_team_player1_id = p.id THEN COALESCE(g.white_team_goalie_score, 0) ELSE 0 END) + SUM(CASE WHEN g.white_team_player2_id = p.id THEN COALESCE(g.white_team_forward_score, 0) ELSE 0 END) + SUM(CASE WHEN g.black_team_player1_id = p.id THEN COALESCE(g.black_team_goalie_score, 0) ELSE 0 END) + SUM(CASE WHEN g.black_team_player2_id = p.id THEN COALESCE(g.black_team_forward_score, 0) ELSE 0 END) as total_goals FROM foosball.players p LEFT JOIN foosball.games g ON p.id IN (g.white_team_player1_id, g.white_team_player2_id, g.black_team_player1_id, g.black_team_player2_id) GROUP BY p.id, p.name;

CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW foosball.team_stats AS SELECT p1.id as player1_id, p1.name as player1_name, p2.id as player2_id, p2.name as player2_name, COUNT(DISTINCT g.id) as games_played_together, COUNT(CASE WHEN g.winner = 'WHITE' AND (g.white_team_player1_id = p1.id AND g.white_team_player2_id = p2.id) THEN 1 END) + COUNT(CASE WHEN g.winner = 'BLACK' AND (g.black_team_player1_id = p1.id AND g.black_team_player2_id = p2.id) THEN 1 END) + COUNT(CASE WHEN g.winner = 'WHITE' AND (g.white_team_player1_id = p2.id AND g.white_team_player2_id = p1.id) THEN 1 END) + COUNT(CASE WHEN g.winner = 'BLACK' AND (g.black_team_player1_id = p2.id AND g.black_team_player2_id = p1.id) THEN 1 END) as wins_together, AVG(CASE WHEN g.white_team_player1_id = p1.id AND g.white_team_player2_id = p2.id THEN g.white_team_score ELSE 0 END) + AVG(CASE WHEN g.black_team_player1_id = p1.id AND g.black_team_player2_id = p2.id THEN g.black_team_score ELSE 0 END) + AVG(CASE WHEN g.white_team_player1_id = p2.id AND g.white_team_player2_id = p1.id THEN g.white_team_score ELSE 0 END) + AVG(CASE WHEN g.black_team_player1_id = p2.id AND g.black_team_player2_id = p1.id THEN g.black_team_score ELSE 0 END) as avg_team_score FROM foosball.players p1 CROSS JOIN foosball.players p2 LEFT JOIN foosball.games g ON (g.white_team_player1_id = p1.id AND g.white_team_player2_id = p2.id) OR (g.black_team_player1_id = p1.id AND g.black_team_player2_id = p2.id) OR (g.white_team_player1_id = p2.id AND g.white_team_player2_id = p1.id) OR (g.black_team_player1_id = p2.id AND g.black_team_player2_id = p1.id) WHERE p1.id < p2.id GROUP BY p1.id, p1.name, p2.id, p2.name HAVING COUNT(DISTINCT g.id) > 0;
